name: Rivals of Aether
description: RIVALS OF AETHER is an indie fighting game set in a world where warring civilizations summon the power of Fire, Water, Air, and Earth. Play with up to four players locally or up to two players online.
minimum_requirements: OS: Microsoft速 Windows速 7 / 8 / 10 Processor: 1.2GHz processor Memory: 512 MB RAM Graphics: DirectX Compatible graphics card with at least 32MB of video memory DirectX: Version 9.0c Storage: 300 MB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Microsoft速 Windows速 7 / 8 / 10 Processor: 1.4GHz processor or faster Memory: 1 GB RAM Graphics: DirectX Compatible graphics card with at least 32MB of video memory DirectX: Version 9.0c Network: Broadband Internet connection Storage: 300 MB available space
